website_summaries.verdict: Simple hallway bench that is light and narrow. Fits well into smaller spaces.
pros: Light wood is surprising comfortable to sit on for short periods of time
cons: Unfinished wood will require extra protection to seal

customer_reviews.title: ... ends of our dining table and couldn't be more pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of them to go at the ends of our dining table and couldn't be more pleased with this product. My 11 year old son had them assembled within a few minutes while I was at work. I applied a few coats of Minwax stain (use pre-stain wood conditioner) so that it would match the table I built then the next day wiped them down with boiled linseed oil. They are beautiful, very sturdy, and highly functional. Could also be used as a coffee table if the dimensions suit you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome.. Fit perfectly with the dinner table and has allowed my to save some much needed space.. Very sturdy and made out of real solid wood.. i kept mine natural and it cleans easily.. But could be finished in any manner you would like... A great bench for a great price... would absolutely buy anything from this company.. and no i was not paid to say that...
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bench!! I refinished an old ball/claw oak table, added some chairs, but wanted a bench. I have been searching for the right size bench, but couldn’t find one locally. Of course, Amazon was next! I’m so happy I ordered this bench! Heavy duty! I painted mine a light cream color, distressed it, then sealed it. It’s beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Old New Mom

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bench!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench, I put it in my mud room right under a pegged coat rack, and stained it to match the coat rack. It's solid wood no particle board here exceptionally easy to assemble. Beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lee Doran

customer_reviews.title: Good, study bench.
customer_reviews.text: I really can't complain about this bench. It arrived on time, it was well packaged, and it was easy to put together. I stained and painted it, and I liked it so much that I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: zoey.fritz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and neutral design that blends with other styles
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. Needed a smaller bench for my foyer of a split level home and it hit the mark perfectly! Came unfinished and plan on painting it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Can be used for almost anything
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Can be used for almost anything. Under a table. A coffe table. A bench. I bought two because they were very reasonable in price. I use one for hallway bench to sit on to remove shoes and one for table for company.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Kochanski

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Front Porch Addition
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller bench for my weather protected front entry porch. This bench is well made and sturdy, does not wobble at all and holds two people easily with a total weight of about 350 lbs. I painted, sealed it and nailed in leg caps. The photo looks like it's green but it is a pretty 'robin's egg blue'. I would recommend it as a smaller bench that will not take up too much space. It is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: B.V.

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and beautiful wood.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I ordered, some company's idea of solid wood is really ...... well, it leaves one wanting. But these are wonderful. I bought them to pain, but I just love the wood...so I talk myself in and out of painting.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my new bench. I've been looking for months and this fits perfect. I had it put together and stained the next day. I also added furniture savers on the bottom of the legs so it slides better.
customer_reviews.author: Ns

customer_reviews.title: perfect for little ones to sit on at the table
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these benches for my lake house, perfect for little ones to sit on at the table.
customer_reviews.author: L c peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great benches
customer_reviews.text: These benches are very well-made and handsome easy to put together. Can’t go wrong for the price either
customer_reviews.author: Boston Gal

customer_reviews.title: Quality! Quality! Quality !...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Super easy to assemble. Fast delivery. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: WiseShopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I stained it and it fits 3 kids (Smaller)
customer_reviews.author: Slovakgrl

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bench
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to put together. I use this bench for seated light weight lifting and extra seating. Paints well. Much nicer than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Belvoir

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bench for a small dining room here at the shore. This bench is sturdy and beautiful. I thought I would paint it, but it is honestly too pretty to paint. I love it and get compliments on it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: deldeb

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This Bench is awesome! We love it, so well made and easy to assemble. Looks great at my dining room table and is a much better seat for my 3 year old. Easily fits 3 preschoolers, which is great for when we have company. So happy with this bench!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Del Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy. Easy to assemble and looks great stained in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Sturdy. Easy to assemble and looks great stained in a beachy grey weathered look.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sturdy!!!  Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised.....sturdy and look great!!! I did elect to put a dark stain on mine and now they sit in the lobby of my family restaurant. Should last many years as heavy as they are!!!
customer_reviews.author: Safariman62

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bench!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality of this bench. I purchased it for our master bedroom sitting area. It's sturdy and the finish is great as is. We don't even plan on painting or staining it. It was easy to assemble as well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great look and value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking and well made wood bench. A very good price also! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Picky Picky

customer_reviews.title: Great peice of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and fits perfectly at the end of my bed. Once I stain it, I will post a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: They are very sturdy and are standing up well to my rowdy bunch ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made benches. I painted them and set them at the back of my kitchen table. They are very sturdy and are standing up well to my rowdy bunch of grandkids that are over every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: janie

customer_reviews.title: nice bench
customer_reviews.text: I need a bench for my mud room, and can't find one that's solid. Found this one on Amazon, perfect size. It arrived on time and looks nice, We think we are just going to leave it with the unfinished color. It's solid and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Z.K.

customer_reviews.title: The bench was easy to stain and put liquid plastic on it
customer_reviews.text: This item was everything that it said it would be. The bench was easy to stain and put liquid plastic on it. It was very easy to put together too. Turned out very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, easy to put together. All in all very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: movie-book lover

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Well made piece. It will serve my intended purpose. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: RangerBear

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The bench was easy to assemble. It is sturdy and well made and the finish is smooth. It is well priced.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color, excellent quality, easy to assemble, I loved it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricio Abalos

customer_reviews.title: Arrived extremely well packed. Bench's quality and craftsmanship exceeded ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived extremely well packed. Bench's quality and craftsmanship exceeded my expectations. It's finish was so smooth I did not even need to sand it before I painted it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect bench to go with our table! It was easy to assemble and is nice and sturdy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to put together. No hardware missing. Just what I expected & hoped for. Nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: Pipkin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong instructions to put it together, not that it was difficult but still, wrong instructions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which doesn't look great. The corner bracing
customer_reviews.text: This is a get-what-you-pay-for bench. The top is made up of short pieces that are end-joined, which doesn't look great. The corner bracing, where the legs attach, is light and may weaken under stress.
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, it's just what I wanted! Thanks for getting it right this time!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy. It looks expensive and could be color matched to anything. Perfect condition. Seller was easy to work with and product came in quickly.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyC

product_meta.title: International Concepts BE-39 Shaker Style Bench, Unfinished
product_meta.description: For those who appreciate high quality wood furniture with a traditional and elegant look. International Concepts home furnishings will complement any decor.
feature_bullets: Strength Group: B6 (same group as maple)
